headline: Bio-Pharmaceutical Logistics Market Report 2026-2035: A $259.32 Billion Market by 2030 with Kuehne + Nagel, FedEx, AmerisourceBergen, UPS, Kerry Logistics, and DB Schenker Leading
summary: Key opportunities in the bio-pharmaceutical logistics market include the expansion in personalized medicine distribution, increased smart cold chain investments, rising demand for cell and gene therapy logistics, and expanded air freight for biologics, supported by advanced IoT-enabled tracking and enhanced regulatory compliance. Bio-Pharmaceutical Logistics Market Bio-Pharmaceutical Logistics Market Dublin, Feb. 20, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The "Bio-Pharmaceutical Logistics Market Report 2026"
